column4: hi i have problem with virus which can infect my wow.exe and then i cant run this game ...here is pic -> http://obrazok.eu/files/t58mzmktsp8k1yd6wbzq.png
anyone have idea how i can protect myself ?
from what?
http://obrazok.eu/files/t58mzmktsp8k1yd6wbzq.png
is your copy of WoW legal?
all copies are legal lol
then it's probably a false alarm
the only other guess wolud be that Wow.exe got replaced
yes but thats a bad idea x(
then reinstall the gabme
do you trust Blizzard? That is what this comes down to. If it is a legal copy then it won't be a problem
reinstalling game do not solve my problem x(
then there are only two possible problems: it isn't a legal copy, or the installer is infected.
you can download the game from blizzard...and thats what i make
then it is a false alarm :)
its not  alarm...i cant start the game because -> Floating point eror i searched on Blizz forums and they say that its Parite.B
then there isn't much anyone in the ubuntu chatroom can do.
i changed privileges for writing to directory only for  a root but nothing :(
oh and i dont have updated ClamAV....how i can update it ?
theres update button but he say that i need to run it as root and i dont know how
figure out the command for starting the ClamAV GUi, then press alt+F2 and type gksu "name of program"
thank you
